overview: Mr Wagiman and his children, Inem and Tarjin, belong to a respected village family. Conflicts arise when Inem is arranged to marry the son of Dono’s family, but the arrangement falls through. So Inem finally goes to Jakarta, with Susy, her best friend. They live with Pakle Bagio and friends, Wisnu and Rendra. Not long after, Tarjin and his friend, Bejah, from the village are invited to Jakarta by Kang Cut, who works for a rich widow, Tetty Qadi Pinky, whose motto is that the customer’s satisfaction is the first priority.
title: Anda Puas Saya Loyo
